word_mean: 体外的：体外生长或发育的

sentence.Network_en: The nonlinear kinetic characters of landslip action are complex, exoteric and dissipated.
sentence.Network_cn: 滑坡行为表现为复杂的 、 开放的和耗散的非线性动力学演化特徵.

sentence.Network_en: Through exoteric and esoteric sources, we know that the Nazarene Master fulfilled his spiritual mission successfully.
sentence.Network_cn: 通过开放和深奥的来源, 我们知道,拿撒勒硕士履行他的精神使命成功.

sentence.Network_en: This system has uniform call flow, exoteric system interface and uniform protocol standard.
sentence.Network_cn: 该系统具有统一的呼叫流程, 开放的系统接口和统一的信令标准.

list.abs: a notional misunderstanding of exoteric novels ., 通俗小说的概念误区.
...永恒哲学”的倡导者们首先对神秘主义的“隐秘宗教”（esoteric religion）和大众信仰的“外在宗教”（exoteric religion）做了区分。前者居于各个宗教的最内在核心处，对不同宗教而言是完全相同的；而后者则包括了处于不同文化下的.
writings of an exoteric nature ., 具有通俗特点的作品.
comparing with long story , short story has more flexible and exoteric artic form that adapts to the narrating attempt .摘要与长篇小说相比，短篇小说有着更加适合叙事实验的灵活、开放的艺术形式。

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 17th cent.: via Latin from Greek exōterikos, from exōterō 'outer', comparative of exō 'outside'
